results.content:
bisher sehr flach, alte Software
praktisch in jeder Session erst mal das gleiche, neue Form, paar gleiche Objekte, ca 1/3 also --> ich habe mir den Kurs mit 2 Facher Geschwindigkeit angesehen
die schwierigeren Sachen wurde schnell und schwach erklärt 
So einen Kurs braucht es nicht

results.content:
it was fine. some of the code was a bit ropey, as someone who has experience doing this a little I'd prefer to see Using blocks used and explained when making objects. Didn't really explain using the HTML either, which is far more worthwhile than using the properties windows and drag/drop.
Good basic, leaves people having to change what they've learned later on though.

results.content: All I can say is thank you so much! I've learned so much from your course. This course made so many aspects of connecting the code, etc more understandable. This course inspired me to learn more about C# and ASP.NET etc. It took me a while to get acquainted with the way you speak but in the end, it actually helps.

response.content: Thanks Wouter for your nice words, I'm ready to any help in the future. Good Luck!
response.content_html: Thanks Wouter for your nice words, I'm ready to any help in the future. Good Luck!

results.content: All in all a good course. Some disturbing sounds in the background (alarms? ringtones?), especially if you're listening via earphones with a high volume-level ;)
results.content_html: All in all a good course. Some disturbing sounds in the background (alarms? ringtones?), especially if you're listening via earphones with a high volume-level ;)

results.content: Excellent for beginners to get all concepts for creating asp.net web applications.
results.content_html: Excellent for beginners to get all concepts for creating asp.net web applications.

results.content: I personally enjoy the content, I am still an apprentice when it comes to ASP.net and it gives me a nice start.
results.content_html: I personally enjoy the content, I am still an apprentice when it comes to ASP.net and it gives me a nice start.

results.content: Grid View could of been explained better, it was more of a brief example. I wanted something with more depth. Left a lot of questions.
results.content_html: Grid View could of been explained better, it was more of a brief example. I wanted something with more depth. Left a lot of questions.

results.content: Good course.  Definitely gave me the info I need to start developing my own pages.
results.content_html: Good course. Definitely gave me the info I need to start developing my own pages.

results.content: He took his time to give a simple and clear cut introduction for beginners who are new to web development
results.content_html: He took his time to give a simple and clear cut introduction for beginners who are new to web development

results.content: There is nothing expert about this curriculum.  This is a good foundational course that gives you a basic understanding, but stops there.
results.content_html: There is nothing expert about this curriculum. This is a good foundational course that gives you a basic understanding, but stops there.

results.content: I think the teacher has a lot of knowledge about the topics and he is explaining the main concepts that we need to know for programming.

results.content: Explanation is very clear and easy to understand.
